Body.Content:
The Windows roadmap is a transparent view into what features and improvements are coming to Windows 11 to help you manage change for your estate. See what’s coming to the Windows Insider Program, what’s gradually rolling out, and what’s generally available with estimated release dates. Check out instructions on how to access these innovations before they’re enabled by default. You can filter by a specific version of Windows, the release channel, device type, or the latest status.  

When will this happen: 
The Windows roadmap is available today. Each upcoming Windows feature and improvement included in it has its own estimated release date. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
You can manage change better for your estate with a view into the features and improvements coming to Windows 11 ahead of time. You’ll also learn how to access them even before they’re enabled by default in your estate. 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
No action is needed. 
 
Additional information: 
  • Read the official announcement at Introducing the Windows roadmap. 
  • Access and bookmark Windows roadmap online.
